pkgmetadata.longdescription: Terminal: for Simple and Beautiful==================================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/lepture/terminal.png?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/lepture/terminal.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/lepture/terminal/badge.png?branch=master :target: https://coveralls.io/r/lepture/terminalA better terminal tools for python.Find documentation at `Read The Docs`_... _`Read The Docs`: https://terminal.readthedocs.org/Features--------* An easy to use command parser* Full featured ANSI colors and styles* Full featured prompt communication* Nested and verbose logging* No dependencies (windows need colorama)Installation------------To install terminal, simply:: $ pip install terminalContribute----------Read the `Contribution Guide`_... _`Contribution Guide`: https://github.com/lepture/terminal/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst
